com.honeywell.aidc

Class Signature

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.honeywell.aidc.Signature

  • public class Signature
extends java.lang.Object
    Result from a call to BarcodeReader.getSignature(SignatureParameters).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String GUIDANCE_MOVE_DOWN
      Indicates that the signature area extends beyond the bottom edge of the imager's view.
      static java.lang.String GUIDANCE_MOVE_LEFT
      Indicates that the signature area extends beyond the left edge of the imager's view.
      static java.lang.String GUIDANCE_MOVE_OUT
      Indicates that the signature area is larger than the imager's view.
      static java.lang.String GUIDANCE_MOVE_RIGHT
      Indicates that the signature area extends beyond the right edge of the imager's view.
      static java.lang.String GUIDANCE_MOVE_UP
      Indicates that the signature area extends beyond the top edge of the imager's view.
      static java.lang.String GUIDANCE_SUCCESS
      Indicates that the signature was successfully captured.
      static java.lang.String GUIDANCE_UNSUPPORTED_SYMBOLOGY
      Indicates that the decoded bar code cannot be used for capturing a signature image.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getGuidance()
      Gets a string describing the result of capturing the signature image.
      Bitmap getImage()
      Gets the signature image or null if capturing the signature was unsuccessful

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getImage

        public Bitmap getImage()
        Gets the signature image or null if capturing the signature was unsuccessful
        Returns:
        the signature image

      • getGuidance

        public java.lang.String getGuidance()
        Gets a string describing the result of capturing the signature image.
        • Success: "success"
        • Failure: guidance string suggesting how to correct the failure
        Returns:
        a string describing the result of capturing the signature image.
